name: Campaign for Real Ale
headAddress: CAMRA, the Campaign for Real Ale
goal: CAMRA, the Campaign for Real Ale is an independent, voluntary organisation campaigning for real ale, community pubs and consumer rights.
interests: Competition, Consumers, Economy, finance and the euro, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: Our EU initiatives are limited except in the circumstances where they impact on real ale drinkers and pub goers in the UK.
